name: Smoker The Car Game
description: Drifting Burnouts Racing & Lots of Smoke
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: amd R9 280 Storage: 4100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Window 10 Processor: AMD FX 8350 & above Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4100 MB available space Additional Notes: SSD will help with performance.
